author: Kitty Greenwald
title: Chicken Schnitzel Sandwich With Comeback Sauce
text:
NEW YORK CITY native Mashama Bailey signed on as executive chef at the Grey in Savannah, Ga., after she saw the restaurant space, an Art Deco former bus terminal. “It was an abandoned shell,” she said. “But when I stepped inside, it felt warm. I thought, ‘I can do this.’”
This chicken schnitzel sandwich has been on the restaurant’s bar menu since it opened. Ms. Bailey opts for rich, flavorful chicken thighs over the usual breasts, and she pounds the meat thin for a tender texture and fast, even frying.
...
